name: Hamtoro Paradise
description:
This is a controller for a sprite that shows the angles of a character in respect to the object's rotation to the camera. The goal was to create a small space where the player needs to look for minigames in order to progress. My partner wants to use a pixel art style for this project, so I was interested in finding a way to have animated 2D art within a 3D space where the camera can both be top-down and over-the-shoulder. 

InputKeyboardForwardWBackwardSTurn LeftATurn RightDMove CameraSpaceExit GameAlt+F4

Notes for the current build: This is my quick art just to be able to visualize what's happening.  Blue is the character's front, yellow is both sides, and red is the back.
